  • Constructor Details

    • Battle

      public Battle(Trainer player, Pokemon playerCurrentPokemon, Trainer challenger, Pokemon challengerCurrentPokemon, int turnCount)
      Constructor to initialize a battle.
      Parameters:
      player - The players Trainer object will be store here.
      playerCurrentPokemon - The players starting pokemon in battle.
      challenger - The challengers Trainer object.
      challengerCurrentPokemon - The challengers starting Pokemon in battle.
      turnCount - The list with the players field effects.

  • Method Details

    • turn

      public int turn() throws InterruptedException
      Method that starts a battle turn, player can select one of 4 options.
      Returns:
      0 if battle should continue, -1 if challenger wins, 1 if player wins.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - Exception needed to use thread.sleep

    • playerAttackFirst

      public boolean playerAttackFirst(Move playerMove, Move challengerMove)
      Method that checks if the player should attack first.
      Parameters:
      playerMove - The move selected by the player.
      challengerMove - The move selected by the challenger.
      Returns:
      true if player should attack first.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method that converts battle info into a string.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the battle info as a String.

    • addFieldEffect

      public boolean addFieldEffect(Trainer trainer, Move moveUsed)
      Method that adds a field effect to a given trainer.
      Parameters:
      trainer - The trainer that used the field effect.
      moveUsed - The move associated with the field effect.
      Returns:
      true if field effect added successfully false if not.

    • checkIfFieldEffectHasBeenAdded

      public FieldEffect checkIfFieldEffectHasBeenAdded(Trainer trainer, String moveName)
      Method that checks if field effect has been added before.
      Parameters:
      trainer - The trainer to have their field effects checked.
      moveName - The name of the field effect.
      Returns:
      null if it has not been added, or the field effect if it has been added.

    • getTrainerFieldEffects

      public ArrayList<FieldEffect> getTrainerFieldEffects(Trainer trainer)
      Method that returns a trainers field effects.
      Parameters:
      trainer - The trainer to have its field effects returned.
      Returns:
      the list of a trainers field effects.

    • getTrainerCurrentPokemon

      public Pokemon getTrainerCurrentPokemon(Trainer trainer)
      Method that returns a trainers current pokemon.
      Parameters:
      trainer - the trainer to have their current pokemon returned.
      Returns:
      the trainers current pokemon.
